ctx: induction a as [| x l IH].
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction a as [| x l IH].
exceptions.tactic: apply lb_ortho_cons_inv in H as [H1 H2].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \\/ y = ⟘) /\\ l ⟂ m" on hypothesis of type "x :: l ⟂ b".

ctx: induction a as [| x l IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment x : bool l, b : lb IH : l ⟂ b -> b ⟂ l H : x :: l ⟂ b H0 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> l ⟂ m H1 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> x = ⟘ \\/ y = ⟘ Unable to unify "?M1917 :: ?M1919 ⟂ ?M1918 :: ?M1920" with "b ⟂ x :: l".

ctx: induction a as [| x l IH].
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

ctx: induction a as [| x l IH].
exceptions.tactic: destruct H1 as [H1 | H1]; [right | left]; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables x, y, l, m.

ctx: induction a as [| x l IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \\/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m x : bool l, b : lb IH : l ⟂ b -> b ⟂ l H : x :: l ⟂ b H0 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> l ⟂ m H1 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> x = ⟘ \\/ y = ⟘ Unable to unify "b ⟂ l" with "b ⟂ x :: l".

original: induction a as [| x l IH]. - intros H. inversion H. apply in_lb_ortho_1. - intros H. apply lb_ortho_cons_inv in H as [H1 H2]. apply in_lb_ortho_2. split. + destruct H1 as [H1 | H1]; [right | left]; auto. + apply IH. auto.
